mapper.select: SELECT A.uri, A.method, C.name FROM t_rbac_permission AS A LEFT JOIN t_rbac_role_permission AS B ON B.permission_id = A.id LEFT JOIN t_rbac_role AS C ON B.role_id = C.id
SELECT A.id, A.name FROM t_rbac_role AS A LEFT JOIN t_rbac_role_permission AS B ON A.id = B.role_id WHERE B.permission_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_rbac_role, t_rbac_user_role, t_rbac_role_permission USING t_rbac_role INNER JOIN t_rbac_user_role INNER JOIN t_rbac_role_permission WHERE t_rbac_user_role.id = t_rbac_role.id AND t_rbac_role_permission.role_id = t_rbac_role.id AND t_rbac_role.id = #{id}
